question:
Identify the Gandhian Movement with the help of given information:
  1. The movement was led by Mahatma Gandhi to protect the Indian peasantry from the exploitative Tinkathia system
  2. The movement recently commemorated its centenary celebrations
  3. The movement utilized the nonviolent methods of protest
  Select the correct answer from options given below:
explanation: Rajkumar Shukla requested Gandhiji to intervene into the matter of the indigo planters of Champaran. The planter were forced to grow indigo on 3/20th of the land. It was known as Tinkathia System. The agitation of Gandhiji eventually abolished the system and helped to recover 25% of the illegally taken money of the planters from the authority. All given features are of Champaran Satyagraha.
